#Daten einlesen

#climate Thailand
t2m = read_excel(file.choose(), sheet= 3)

#Plot f체r die Durchschnittstemperatur in Thailand f체r 2006 - 2020
```{r}
t2m_mean_thailand = apply(t2m[,c(5:184)],2,function(x){
  mean(x)
})

dates <- seq(as.Date("2006-01-01"), as.Date("2020-12-01"), by = "month", format = "%m")

model = lm(t2m_mean_thailand ~ dates)
summary(model)

plot(x = dates, y = t2m_mean_thailand, 
     type = "l", ylab = "temperature in 째C", xlab = "years", main = "Durchschnittstemperatur in Thailand f체r 2006 - 2020", col = "red");abline(model, col = "blue")
```
